gobblin.compaction.dataset

Class SimpleDatasetsFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.compaction.dataset.DatasetsFinder
      • gobblin.compaction.dataset.SimpleDatasetsFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatasetsFinder<Dataset>

    public class SimpleDatasetsFinder
extends DatasetsFinder
    Implementation of DatasetsFinder. It simply takes MRCompactor.COMPACTION_INPUT_DIR as input, and MRCompactor.COMPACTION_DEST_DIR as output.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gobblin.compaction.dataset.DatasetsFinder

    • Method Detail

      • findDistinctDatasets

        public Set<Dataset> findDistinctDatasets()
                                  throws IOException
        Create a dataset using DatasetsFinder.inputDir and DatasetsFinder.destDir. Set dataset input path to be DatasetsFinder.destDir if DatasetsFinder.recompactDatasets is true.
        Specified by:
        findDistinctDatasets in class DatasetsFinder
        Throws:
        IOException
